properties.senderName: NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued February 3 at 3:19PM MST until February 3 at 7:00PM MST by NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one
quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. For the Wind
Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph.

* WHERE... Along I-10 between the AZ/NM state line to Lordsburg.

* WHEN...For the Blowing Dust Advisory, until 7 PM MST this
evening. For the Wind Advisory, until 8 PM MST this evening.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Dust from the Lordsburg Playas could
reduce visibilities along Interstate I-10 from the state line to
Lordsburg.
properties.instruction:
Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust.
Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.

Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING
